price: Ɛmma sε ͻman bi betumi ama ne berε (a ͻsεeε bεba ne soͻ no) aba animu anaa akͻ akyire.
arabic: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَـٔۡخِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā tasbiqu min ummatin ajalahā wamā yastakhirūna
